sentence.text: On June 12 nine former politburo members were reported expelled from the PLA .

The House may expel members whom it considers unfit to serve .
Nkrumah dealt with the rebels by expelling 81 CPP members ; many of them drifted over to the NPP .
On Nov. 23 the party announced that 12,500 of its 48,000,000 members had been expelled in 1989 , largely for corruption .
The politburo also expelled Mr Miroslav Stepan , former head of the party in Prague .
Liu Binyan and Su Xiaokang were expelled from the official Chinese Writers ' Association for their " anti-government activities abroad " .
He was expelled from QUB after a conviction which resulted from a too-well-celebrated student society dinner .
The electricians were expelled from the TUC in 1988 and a positive vote from the new union would lead to a reunification of the British trade union movement .
He and weightlifter Andrew Saxton were expelled for using the drug Clenbuterol .
Criticised by some of his superiors as a communist , Aristide was expelled from his Salesian order in 1988 for failing to comply with an order transferring him to Canada .

In Hungary , the ruling party expelled Istvan Csurka , the country 's leading right-wing nationalist , from its ranks .
Ho Non was expelled from the central committee for " inappropriateness " and " pilfering for personal benefit " .
